p.s: In today article I want to report about my friend Bianca's experiences with volunteering an Education Center for children, located in a slum of Delhi.
Bianca's day starts at 8:30 amante meridiem where she wakes up and then works up until 4 pmpost meridiem.
During this time she has a variety of activities to do with the local children.
Now talking about the children she phrases they were the best thing about her voluntery.
She says she had lost her heart to them.
Seeing their lust and love for life after having such traumatising backgrounds amazes her.
They're laughing, experiencing and mostly just having fun all together.
In conclusion to her voluntery Bianca states how she had felt many emotions with the children, saying they were almost all positive.
Besides everything Bianca is very thankful for the children.
Love, hope etc. is what they made her feel.
